page.title: 18A Day at Littlehampton Fair
page.content: On Saturday 13 July Iwent to the fair at Southfields Recreation Ground.It was 7.30 in the evening and the noise of the fair ground could be heard a long way away.The fair was small in comparison to some I have been to but nevertheless very exciting. There is always a certain mystery associated with travelling fairs and this one was no different. There were many rides including such names as the space walk, and rocker plane and more traditional ones such as the infamous "Dodgems". I spent a great deal of time just wandering around looking at the sideshows and at the peoples happy faces as they went for yet another ride on the waltser. It was a very enjoyable evening .
